text: Anɨb ak nep, bin bɨ sek mɨdebɨm okok, nɨbi nɨgɨmɨl sɨkop muk okok mɨdɨl, agɨnɨgel tek nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgem, bɨ nɨbi ogɨnap God takaw ne ak tɨbɨlɨkɨpal okok, nɨbi kɨlop muk okok mɨdɨl, tap gach sek ma gɨl gɨtep gɨpɨm ak nɨgɨnɨgabal. Nɨbi God takaw ogɨnap kɨlop ma agɨnɨmɨb, kɨli gɨtep gɨpɨm ak nep nɨŋɨd, Klays nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabal.
